mapper.update: update hsp_dbzl_bas a set a.id_nbr = #{idNbr, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.nation = #{nation, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.emg_job = #{emgJob, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.marital_status = #{maritalStatus, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.jzxh = #{jzxh, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.zyxh = #{zyxh, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.mod_no = #{modNo, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, a.mod_tim = sysdate where a.reg_seq = #{regSeq, jdbcType = VARCHAR}
